content.p: King's Meadow Campus Gym is equipped with a range of cardiovascular, resistance and free weight equipment. This facility is for the exclusive use of The University of Nottingham staff, and is open Monday to Friday, 7am - 8pm. Facilities include: If you have any questions about the Kings Meadow Campus Gym, please contact sport@nottingham.ac.uk Our fitness instructors can design a program to help you reach your goals and make the most out of your time in the gym. If you need some guidance on your fitness routine or if your training has plataued and you would like fresh ideas, the please contact sport@nottingham.ac.uk to book in for a fitness program. David Ross Sports Village University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0)115 74 87000 email: sport@nottingham.ac.uk
